thread.title: Is Kaththi Chiranjeevi’s 150th?
thread.title_full: Is Kaththi Chiranjeevi’s 150th? - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Is Kaththi Chiranjeevi’s 150th?
text:
Speculation surrounding Megastar Chiranjeevi's 150th film is never ending. While the actor is presently shooting for a cameo in son Ram Charan's Bruce lee, it is being heard that the actor's milestone project will be the remake of Tamil film Kaththi with director VV Vinayak.
It is heard that pre-production is taking place in full swing and that the project will kick start in November.
It is interesting to note that Ram Charan who will produce this flick had earlier announced that director Puri Jagannadh will helm this flick. However, it seems things didn't work out and the project got deferred.
